model

Class GameConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.GameConfiguration

  • public class GameConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information about the possible difficulties and the URL for getting and setting highscores (HighscoreEntry). This information is loaded with ConfigurationSaxHandler
